Package org.treetank.service.xml

Package XML Layer

See: Description

Package org.treetank.service.xml Description

Package XML Layer

The package xml layer implements all axis iterations for the encoding implemented in the node layer. It also provides an adaptor for the saxon XPath/XQuery/XSLT reference implementation. Finally, it comes with SAX bindings required to shred an XML document or serialize one.

Author:
Marc Kramis, University of Konstanz, Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
